comments:
Create a profile with an enumeration E1 and literals L1, L2 and L3. Create stereotype S1 with a property e1 of type enumeration E1. Apply the profile to some model and stereotype S1 to some element in the model. Change value (for that element) of e1 from L1 (default) to L3.


A potential NPE gets thrown from the following location (see below)...


Stack trace:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.uml2.uml.internal.operations.PackageOperations$StereotypeApplicationCopier.copyEEnumAttribute(PackageOperations.java:198)

	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil$Copier.copy(EcoreUtil.java:448)
	at org.eclipse.uml2.uml.internal.operations.PackageOperations.applyProfile(PackageOperations.java:490)

The fix has been committed to CVS.
The fix is available in build M200701181306.
